post.body: No.
When I went home, my friends who know i know people from techTV ONLY asked what you were up to. so there.
Hey I am ripping your DirecTV interivew now. I will upload it by the end of the day.
I hear you. Maybe just borrow all the extra joy your kids have between Thanksgiving and Christmas. I am sure they will share.
What are "Loot-Crazed mobs"?
agreed. Boston Legal will be missed.
YES!
hahahaha Brunswick Bowl, hahaha. blast from my past.
Wake up and smell America Trixie.
I'd pay for that. Does it come with an in-person tutorial??
I am pretty impressed :)
on Deathwing??
Grats Eileen! So will you play in the finals?
Are you trying to turn me on with Tolle talk again?
Are you back? Logging onto MSN.
omw!
can you go "hooker man pants suit" look?
I was really into Big Brother during one of my "lonely periods". Would watch them at night while I played wow.
No as a general rule.
If they are textured hose. ala Fish net or stripes.
I really wish I was going tonight. :(
Yes I do, because my 950 Facebook people don't need to know what I am doing all day. Twitter is a more intimate circle.
Grats Mr. Blount. I know your team has worked super hard on this launch. Can't wait to be able to afford a PS3 ;)
No kidding.
"swiss raclette" recipe please.
:( I am so sorry sweetie. This really sucks.
the joys of alcohol.
I loved the pre-show REM set. Had it blasting in my house.
this means you should.
don't be dead Rom.
I am home as well, because it is cheaper to do it for $350/month instead of my $1500/mo in SF. No idea what city I will land.
Are you really back home for good?
They are magnificent bastards.
Stop it with the hints. Yule get your Christmas present...
I know! We have sun today as well! Going for a run now.
As soon as our Charter Internet is back up, I'll be L4Ding. Playing on a wireless laptop USB card currently.
Totally with you on that one.
<3 and more <3
The concept was enjoyable, but the execution was barrier to my personal enjoyment.
I love your new avatar so much!
I have to watch a 4am game of Source for new Aussie team tonight, but maybe this weekend? I have never played but downloaded it.
LD4 steam??? lets play!
NOOO did I miss Liars dice at buddha bar?
I missed the sound of the old train through downtown. I forgot how we use to stand up next to the tracks and scream as loud as we could.
Making leftover turkey chili from veggies grown in my roommate's backyard. SO excited for tomorrow's lunch. Really wish it was not turkey.
Welcome @vidgames. Missed you.
RT @extralife via RT @feliciaday: http://is.gd/9UdN (someone hacked santa's gmail)
Jogging outside in the cold is a totally different experience. Breathing was ouch.l
Will someone please tell me what I want to be when I grow up.
Does anyone use Mevio.com? Looking for people who visit the site semi-regularly.
Slept until 10am. Have not done that in weeks. It is WAY too cold outside. Maybe that is why. Dear lord why don't these people move to CA?
Why is Obama still fundraising? Now it is an Obama coffee mug: http://is.gd/9XfT
People who hire, are 2 page resumes bad or good.
I made up some crockpot "Hop n Jon" last night, and could not wait to eat it. Black eyed peas for bfast. I'll be sorry in about an hour.
Catching up on TankSpot.com during maintenance. Realizing how low my hit rating is for a TG spec.
Layer of frost over everything outside. Wood furnace burning. Queso dip on the stove for dinner. Bud light. Starting Wall-E.
instead I am in Nagrand.
I want to be somewhere new, in front of a fire with a man talking about anything.
Friday night. It's really dark.
I promised myself, not buying games until I get a job, but I cheated and picked up ChronoTrigger DS. Oh and Left 4 Dead PC.
MY GOD I need to go dancing to really dirty nasty sweaty breaks. I miss SF.
Im having a real down day today.
The wet beer boxes only smoked us out. Instead we stole Time Life's "Flower Power" collection on the newsgroups. 172 timeless hits.
I did want to share my night in front of the fire with ya'll. Nice enough to tie me over... http://is.gd/artG
All the gentlemen at Heath's house have run to the backyard to burn all the beer boxes in the firepit. Who says you can't relive highschool.
Today I am updating my Youtube reel with the BlizzCon content, finishing one of my resume versions, moving bedrooms, canceling subscriptions
Overslept on purpose this morning. I had a few dreams I wanted to work out the details on.
Today's meditation is allowing life to be just what it is right now.
RT @Veronica Sigur Ros playing in the Prince of Persia ads was a surprising choice, but I kind of like it. Epic.
The old band room is now my bedroom, and the band room is outside my room... and Heath is drunk and playing the drums. Not Rock Band drums.
Hey quick ? I need a quality custom printed T-Shirt by this Saturday. Suppliers? Not CafePress.
Going through all my monthly subscriptions and canceling them. More than I thought. Real.com, eharmony, sprint, mobileme...
My secret admission: All I want for Christmas is a pedicure, bikini wax, high pressure tanning bed and 4 hours with my colorist.
Ok I am going to give "Burn Notice" a shot.
An excellent article on the current situation in Zimbabwe - http://is.gd/bcGW
Watching Charlie Rose. Really want Elliott Charter's green suspenders. Would be classic with a crisp white shirt and tux pants.
Thoughts go out to all the Yahoo peeps who lost their job today.
Raining this morning.
I likey me the south in the wintertime.
There are 6 men in their late 30's reliving their band days in the room beside mine. Xanax anyone? ;)
Today we have two guest arrive, then another tomorrow. Gonna mop the floor so the 3 dogs have something clean to mud up when they wake up.
Ding 80 :)
I would at least come up with something better than 1234
Just finished the Dragonblight quest chains. Kudos Blizzard, very cool.
WIshing I could see the NYC snow!
Im up at 4am listening to a CS match. I love you @eileenbell :)
REM is the best band of all time. GREEN for life.
Freaking Tuesdays. WoW servers never come back up on time. 4pm PST...
